app.name: SubtitlePro
hero.title: Add Subtitles to Your Videos Automatically
hero.description: Upload your video and get accurate subtitles in multiple languages in minutes. No manual transcription needed. No login required.
hero.queueNotice: Note: Your video will be processed in order of submission. You'll be able to track your position in the queue.
upload.title: Upload your video
upload.dragDrop: Drag and drop or click to browse
upload.queueNotice: Free service: Videos are processed in order of submission. You'll receive a unique link to track your video's status in the queue.
features.title: Features
features.heading: Why Choose SubtitlePro?
features.description: Our advanced AI technology makes adding subtitles to your videos quick, accurate, and hassle-free.
features.multipleLanguages.title: Multiple Languages
features.multipleLanguages.description: Generate subtitles in 5 different languages with a single upload. Perfect for reaching a global audience.
features.fastProcessing.title: Fast Processing
features.fastProcessing.description: Our advanced AI processes your videos quickly, so you don't have to wait long for your subtitled content.
features.highAccuracy.title: High Accuracy
features.highAccuracy.description: State-of-the-art speech recognition ensures your subtitles are accurate and properly synchronized.
features.realTimeStatus.title: Real-time Status
features.realTimeStatus.description: Track the progress of your subtitle generation in real-time with our intuitive status page.
features.easyDownload.title: Easy Download
features.easyDownload.description: Download your subtitled video with one click once processing is complete.
features.freeService.title: Free Service
features.freeService.description: Our service is completely free to use with no login required. Videos are processed in order of submission.
howItWorks.title: Process
howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Adding subtitles to your videos has never been easier. Just follow these simple steps.
howItWorks.step1.title: Upload Your Video
howItWorks.step1.description: Drag and drop your video file or browse to select it from your device.
howItWorks.step2.title: Select Languages
howItWorks.step2.description: Choose from 5 different languages for your subtitles.
howItWorks.step3.title: Wait in Queue
howItWorks.step3.description: Your video will be processed in order. Track your position in the queue on the status page.
howItWorks.step4.title: Download Result
howItWorks.step4.description: Once processing is complete, download your video with embedded subtitles.
testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what content creators are saying about SubtitlePro.
testimonials.1.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.1.quote: SubtitlePro has been a game-changer for my YouTube channel. I can now reach a global audience without spending hours on manual subtitling.
testimonials.2.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.2.quote: The accuracy of the subtitles is impressive. I've tried other tools, but SubtitlePro consistently delivers the best results for my documentary films.
testimonials.3.name: Elena Rodriguez
testimonials.3.quote: Our marketing videos now reach audiences in multiple countries thanks to SubtitlePro. The process is so simple, and the results are fantastic.
status.title: Video Status
status.queueMessage: Your video is waiting in the queue. We'll process it as soon as possible.
status.startedMessage: Processing has started. This may take a few minutes.
status.completedMessage: Your video is ready! Download it now.
status.failedMessage: We encountered an error while processing your video. Please try again.
status.deleteNotice: Your file will be deleted in
footer.description: Automatically add subtitles to your videos in multiple languages. Free, no login required.
